replies.body: no one wants to join your nazi discord server
Why is this update over 3 gig for me???
Is it just me who spotted Teemo in all new Omega skins?
Holy shit, lore wise, this is when Teemo was a recruit in the Omega Squad... and then, all the others died.
I go to rotating game mode. Sees ascension. Goes to the corner cause I want urf.

Since the new patch there has been a giant bar at the top of the screen when in game, for the first 1 minute 10 - showing whatever the tip/did you know/hint that showed in loading screen. this is not needed and very distracting in arams when a lot can happen in the first minute. Please remove.
